description: Zess is 25 years old soldier of Athens. He met Rygart at military school, where he was called "straight-laced Zess". He was one of the best pilots and was the full of pride. He met Rygart when he was being bullied and not complaining or fighting back, scaring the bullies off and quickly befriended Rygart afterward. When he learns his nation plans to conquer Krisna, he leads a small commando strike force of mechs to the Krisna capital in order to make Hodr surrender quickly to spare his friends and their country from the wrath of the main Athens Invasion Army, unaware that the leaders of Athens wants the royal family executed. He is married and has a 2 year old daughter.
name: Zess
